name: zero nans
description:
Zero nans ‚Äî Noobai-based SDXL vPred Merge

A lineart-focused, sketch-style SDXL model merge built on NoobaiXLNAIXL_vPred1, enhanced with handpicked models like AozoraXL, LHC vPred, Duchaiten Style 18 + others, and a self-trained LoRA.

(Edit: use modelsamplingdiscrete if you're using ComfyUI)

üîß Recommended Settings

  • Sampler: Eulercfg++

  • Steps: 28

  • CFG: 1

üñäÔ∏è Prompting Tips
Use Danbooru tags & artist tags, check out their wiki on https://danbooru.donmai.us/wiki_pages/help:home

üß¨ Merge Components
NoobaiXL, AozoraXL, LHC vPred, Duchaiten Style 18, DimSum, Self-trained LoRA

name: Nova Animal XL
description:
Nova Animal XL

A realistic furry checkpoint model that can have great details on any type of furs, scales and feathers, which aims to be XL-lized Persika Furry

PixAI - Illustrious v6.0

PixAI - Illustrious v5B

PixAI - Illustrious v5A

PixAI - Illustrious v4B

PixAI - Illustrious v4A

PixAI - Illustrious v3.0

PixAI - Illustrious v2.0

PixAI - Illustrious v1.0

PixAI - v1

PixAI - v2

PixAI - v3

PixAI - v4

tensorART

Rules

You cannot use the generated images for commercial use if it's not edited (or just turning it to black and white)

Advertising is always welcome

Recommended settings

Sampler: Euler a

Steps: 20-40

(Pony)

CFG Scale: 6-7

Prompt: score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, BREAK, furry, anthro, detailed face eyes and fur, {Animal Type}

Negative Prompt: score_6,score_5,score_4, source_anime,source_cartoon, 2d, art, cartoon, blurry, jpeg artifacts, username, watermark, signature, normal quality, worst quality, large head, low quality, text, error, missing fingers, extra digits, fewer digits, bad eye

(Illustrious)

CFG Scale: 3-6

Prompt: masterpiece, best quality, amazing quality, very aesthetic, high resolution, ultra-detailed, absurdres, scenery, photo, realistic, furry, anthro, {Prompt}, BREAK, depth of field, detailed fluffy fur, photorealistic details

Negative Prompt: smooth skin, human, multiple tails, 2d, art, old, oldest, cartoon, graphic, text, painting, crayon, graphite, abstract, glitch, deformed, mutated, ugly, disfigured, long body, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, missing fingers, extra digits, fewer digits, very displeasing, (worst quality, bad quality:1.2), bad anatomy, sketch, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, simple background, conjoined, bad ai-generated

name: HomoSimile XL [Pony, Illustrious, NoobAI]
description:
Simile = comparison, likeness, parallel, similar, resembling

Note: Preview images are generated without the use of LORAs

NoobAI ver. [v3.0, v4.0, v5.0]

‚ö†Ô∏èATTENTION‚ö†Ô∏è

Most LORAs trained for Illustrious XL are still compatible with NoobAI Eps models so if you're sticking with ILXL for the LORAs you might as well switch to the NAI version.
Also, here is the list for the artist tags. There are two files in the zip file, one if the full artist list and the other is the list of artist that I've personally tested to be working and most of them are also from gay artists..

About

To be honest I didn't expect to update this quickly but I can't resist NoobAI's updated datasets. Artist tags also performs much better with less dependent on emphasis to achieve a desired effect. Overall it is an improvement of the already great model, Illustrous XL.

Tips for artist styles / characters

Similar to ILXL, just add in the artist or character tags and that's it. If you're not sure what to write for the tags, just search it on danbooru or here. See sample images for examples on how to prompt the tags..

My Settings

Sampling Method: - Euler a (less detailed and smoother textures)
                 - DPM++ 2M (more detailed lines and textures)
Sampling Steps: 20+
Upscaler: 4x_NMKD-Siax_200k / Remacri
CFG Scale: 3 - 5
Clip Skip: 2
VAE : Already built-in

Positive Prompt:

very awa, masterpiece, best quality, absurdres, perfect quality, detailed background, intricate details

Negative Prompt:

lowres, worst quality, bad quality, bad anatomy, signature, username, logo, watermark, artist name, bad hands

Illustrious ver. [v2.0]

About

Personally I still prefer the default style of the Pony version but the prompt adherence and style flexibility of the Illustrious XL is just too good to pass up. Prompting and tagging is also a lot easier than the pony version from what I've tested. I tried to replicate the look of the Pony version but there's just too much artist styles for me to do anything without messing with the overall quality, oh well..

Tips for artist styles / characters

Illustrious is a fine-tuned model trained on Danbooru datasets, so there are a lot of data on various artist's styles and characters. So you can prompt a specific style or characters without the need of loras as long as they have substantial amount of dataset on Danbooru and are not too recent. See sample images for examples on how to prompt styles..

My Settings

Sampling Method: Euler a, DPM++ 2M / DPM++ 3M SDE
Sampling Steps: 25+
Upscaler: 4x_NMKD-Siax_200k / Remacri
CFG Scale: 3 - 6
Clip Skip: 2
VAE : Already built-in

Positive Prompt:

masterpiece, best quality, absurdres, newest, perfect quality, best quality, absolutely eye-catching, detailed background, intricate details

Negative Prompt:

lowres, worst quality, bad quality, bad anatomy, sketch, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, artist name, old

Pony ver. [v1.0]

About

Just like with my HomoSimile model, I'm trying to get that specific look that's between 'anime' and 'western art'. I went a bit easy with the LORAs to ensure better compatibility with other styles. So if you want to use a specific artist's styles it wont diminish the results.

My Settings

Sampling Method: DPM++ 2M / DPM++ 3M SDE
Sampling Steps: 30+
Upscaler: 4x_NMKD-Siax_200k / Remacri
CFG Scale: 4 - 6
Clip Skip: 2
VAE : Already built-in

Positive Prompt:

score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, highly detailed, intricate details, detailed background

Negative Prompt:

score_6, score_5, score_4, score_3, score_2, score_1, low quality, deformed, bad hands, watermark

‚ö†Ô∏èDISCLAIMER‚ö†Ô∏è

Please do NOT generate illegal content with this model. You are solely responsible for any unethical use of this model(s)

Model License

  • Pony Diffusion v6 XL

  • Illustrious XL

  • NoobAI-XL

modelVersions.name: v5.0 [NAI-XL EPS]_BETA
modelVersions.description:
v5.0_BETA

What's new:

  • Slightly more vibrant colors.

  • Better response to artist tags.

  • Slight increase in 'bara-ness' much like in v3.0

  • Added 6 new artists tags : 'kuromine hiraya', 'ppatta', 'patrick fillion', 'qaisan', 'rennik', and 'tageme gengoroh'. However, the quality and strength of the artist styles are not as good as I would have hoped. You're probably better off using a LORA. Oh well, maybe next time..

  • Other minor adjustments

P/s : I'm marking it as BETA for now because I haven't fully tested it yet. This was my first attempt at adding new artist styles so I'm not sure how well the model is gonna perform on Civitai generator..

modelVersions.name: v4.0 [NAI-XL EPS]
modelVersions.description:
v4.0

What's new:

  • Slight tweak in details especially in background.

  • Very slightly reduced results defaulting to very 'bara' characters to make it easier to generate non-bara bodies.

  • Minor adjustments

name: Ikastrious
description:
--prompt--
(explicit|general), masterpiece, best quality, 
anime coloring (if you need)
--negative--
lowres, worst quality, bad quality, bad anatomy, bad hands, sketch, signature, watermark, logo, border

Recommend settings

  • Sampling method & Schedule type: Euler a & automatic

  • Sampling steps: 20~40

  • CFG Scale: 4~7

  • Recommend Hires fix (x1.5)
